text: E jenumanja wankulupilile! Munkulupililani Allah ni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ kwisa soni Chitabu chaatulwisye kwa Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ ni Chitabu chawatulwisye kalakala, sano jwaakwika mwakunkana Allah, malaika Gakwe, itabu Yakwe, achimitenga Wakwe ni Lisiku Lyambesi, nikuti amasile mwapotele kupotela kwakutalikangana (ni yakuona)
